integrators.name: Forward Euler
integrators.recommended_use_case: Baseline comparison only; not suitable for production simulations due to secular energy drift

integrators.name: Velocity Verlet
integrators.recommended_use_case: General-purpose N-body integration; excellent energy conservation with minimal overhead

integrators.name: Leapfrog (KDK)
integrators.recommended_use_case: Equivalent to Verlet; preferred when adaptive time-stepping is needed (natural KDK form)
